comment.author: 9856200@N04
comment._content: The complex in the center of the view was the Virginia Methodist Children's Home at 3900 West Broad Street in Richmond, Virginia.  The site now serves as the Richmond Campus of the successor United Methodist Family Services.  The property was bordered by West Broad Street, North Hamilton Street and Westwood Avenue.  The tracks of the Richmond, Fredericksburg and Potomac Railroad can be seen to the east of the Home.  The land around the Home was an active farm until 1953.
